text: Gymnostomum is a genus of bryophyte in family Pottiaceae.Buck, William R. & Bernard Goffinet. 2000. "Morphology and classification of mosses", pages 71-123 in A. Jonathan Shaw & Bernard Goffinet (Eds.), Bryophyte Biology. (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press). . It was first described by Christian Gottfried Daniel Nees von Esenbeck and Christian Friedrich Hornschuch It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Gymnostomum boreale, Nyholm & Hedenäs * Gymnostomum japonicum ==References== Category:Pottiaceae Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Moss genera
title: Gymnostomum
